mapper.sql: COI.id, COI.commodity_order_id, COI.commodity_id, COI.user_id, COI.profit, COI.title, COI.old_price, COI.price, COI.commodity_price_name, COI.commodity_model, COI.number, COI.remark, COI.status, COI.create_time, COI.creator_id, COI.creator_name, COI.code, COI.commodity_price_id, COI.activity_promotion_id, COI.activity_promotion_price

COI.id COI_id, COI.commodity_order_id COI_commodity_order_id, COI.commodity_id COI_commodity_id, COI.user_id COI_user_id, COI.profit COI_profit, COI.title COI_title, COI.old_price COI_old_price, COI.price COI_price, COI.commodity_price_name COI_commodity_price_name, COI.commodity_model COI_commodity_model, COI.number COI_number, COI.remark COI_remark, COI.status COI_status, COI.create_time COI_create_time, COI.creator_id COI_creator_id, COI.creator_name COI_creator_name, COI.code COI_code, COI.commodity_price_id COI_commodity_price_id, COI.activity_promotion_id COI_activity_promotion_id, COI.activity_promotion_price COI_activity_promotion_price

COI.id id, COI.commodity_order_id commodityOrderId, COI.commodity_id commodityId, COI.user_id userId, COI.profit profit, COI.title title, COI.old_price oldPrice, COI.price price, COI.commodity_price_name commodityPriceName, COI.commodity_model commodityModel, COI.number number, COI.remark remark, COI.status status, COI.create_time createTime, COI.creator_id creatorId, COI.creator_name creatorName, COI.code code, COI.commodity_price_id commodityPriceId, COI.activity_promotion_id activityPromotionId, COI.activity_promotion_price activityPromotionPrice
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `COMMODITY_ORDER_INFO`( id, commodity_order_id, commodity_id, user_id, profit, title, old_price, price, commodity_price_name, commodity_model, number, remark, status, create_time, creator_id, creator_name, code, commodity_price_id, activity_promotion_id, activity_promotion_price )VALUES( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oldPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{commodityPriceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityPriceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityPromotionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityPromotionPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

INSERT INTO `COMMODITY_ORDER_INFO`( id, commodity_order_id, commodity_id, user_id, profit, title, old_price, price, commodity_price_name, commodity_model, number, remark, status, create_time, creator_id, creator_name, code, commodity_price_id, activity_promotion_id, activity_promotion_price ) VALUES
( #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.commodityOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.profit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.oldPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.commodityPriceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.commodityModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.commodityPriceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.activityPromotionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.activityPromotionPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.delete: DELETE COI FROM `COMMODITY_ORDER_INFO` COI WHERE COI.ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE `COMMODITY_ORDER_INFO` COI SET COI.STATUS = -1 WHERE COI.ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(coi.number) FROM commodity_order_info coi WHERE coi.commodity_order_id = #{id}
SELECT SUM(coi.number) FROM commodity_order_info coi WHERE coi.commodity_id = #{commodityId}
SELECT coi.title, coi.price, coi.number, coi.user_id FROM commodity_order_info coi WHERE coi.commodity_order_id = #{coId};

SELECT coi.id, coi.commodity_id comId, coi.`status`, coi.profit, coi.price, coi.title, ci.url FROM commodity_order_info coi LEFT JOIN commodity_images ci ON ( coi.commodity_id = ci.source_id ) WHERE coi.user_id = ${userId} AND ci.type = 1
AND coi.`status` = -2
AND coi.`status` in (0 ,1)
AND coi.`status` = 2
ORDER BY coi.create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE commodity_order_info coi SET coi.`status` = 2 WHERE coi.id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ci.url, coi.id, coi.commodity_id, coi.title, coi.commodity_price_name, coi.commodity_model, coi.profit, coi.price, coi.number, u.`name` userName, coi.remark, coi.code, coi.`status`, coi.user_id FROM commodity_order_info coi LEFT JOIN commodity_images ci ON (ci.source_id = coi.commodity_id) LEFT JOIN `user` u ON (u.id = coi.user_id) WHERE coi.commodity_order_id = #{coId} AND ci.type = 1

SELECT coi.*, CASE WHEN ap.type = '1' THEN '下单立减' WHEN ap.type = '2' THEN '首单立减' WHEN ap.type = '3' THEN '第二单立减' ELSE 0 END ap_type, CASE WHEN ap.price IS NOT NULL THEN ap.price WHEN ap.price != '' THEN ap.price ELSE 0 END ap_price, IFNULL(si.url, '') images_url, ci.url FROM commodity_order_info coi LEFT JOIN commodity_images ci ON (coi.commodity_id = ci.source_id) LEFT JOIN `activity_promotion` ap ON coi.activity_promotion_id = ap.id LEFT JOIN service_images si ON ap.id = si.source_id WHERE coi.commodity_order_id = #{coId} AND ci.type=1
SELECT coi.id, coi.commodity_order_id, coi.`status` FROM `commodity_order_info` coi WHERE coi.commodity_order_id = #{comId}

SELECT coi.id, coi.commodity_id comId, coi.`status`, coi.profit, coi.price, coi.title, ci.url FROM commodity_return cr LEFT JOIN commodity_order_info coi ON (cr.commodity_order_info_id = coi.id) LEFT JOIN commodity_images ci ON ( coi.commodity_id = ci.source_id ) WHERE coi.user_id = #{userId} AND ci.type = 1 AND cr.`status` = 2 ORDER BY coi.create_time

SELECT coi.id, coi.commodity_id comId, coi.`status`, coi.profit, coi.price, coi.title, ci.url FROM `transaction` t LEFT JOIN commodity_order_info coi ON (t.order_id = coi.id) LEFT JOIN commodity_images ci ON ( coi.commodity_id = ci.source_id ) WHERE t.creator_id = #{userId} AND t.type = 2 AND t.operate = 4 AND t.operate_source = 1 AND ci.type = 1 ORDER BY coi.create_time

SELECT coi.id, coi.commodity_id comId, coi.`status`, coi.profit, coi.price, coi.title, ci.url,coi.create_time FROM commodity_order_info coi LEFT JOIN commodity_images ci ON ( coi.commodity_id = ci.source_id ) LEFT JOIN commodity_order co ON ( coi.commodity_order_id = co.id ) WHERE coi.user_id = #{userId} AND co.`schedule` = 4 AND ci.type = 1 AND coi.id NOT IN ( SELECT t.order_id FROM `transaction` t WHERE t.operate = 4 and t.type=2 ) AND coi.id NOT IN( SELECT cr.commodity_order_info_id FROM commodity_return cr where cr.status = 2 ) ORDER BY coi.create_time

SELECT coi.id, coi.commodity_id comId, coi.`status`, coi.profit, coi.price, coi.title, ci.url FROM commodity_order_info coi LEFT JOIN commodity_images ci ON ( coi.commodity_id = ci.source_id ) LEFT JOIN commodity_order co ON (coi.commodity_order_id = co.id) WHERE coi.user_id = #{userId} AND ci.type = 1 ORDER BY coi.create_time
